Uses of Package
com.erudika.para.security

Packages that use com.erudika.para.security
Package Description
com.erudika.para.security
The security module - handles authentication.
com.erudika.para.security.filters
Authentication filters - these handle social login and external authentication.
  • Classes in com.erudika.para.security used by com.erudika.para.security
    Class Description
    AuthenticatedUserDetails
    Stores information about authenticated users.
    CachedCsrfTokenRepository
    A CsrfTokenRepository that stores the CsrfToken in Cache.
    JWTAuthentication
    Represents a user authentication with JWT.
    JWTRestfulAuthFilter
    Security filter that intercepts authentication requests (usually coming from the client-side) and validates JWT tokens.
    LDAPAuthentication
    Represents a user authentication with LDAP.
    SimpleAuthenticationFailureHandler
    Simple handler for successful authentication requests.
    SimpleAuthenticationSuccessHandler
    Simple handler for successful authentication requests.
    SimpleRememberMeServices
    A slightly modified version of TokenBasedRememberMeServices.
    UserAuthentication
    A simple wrapper for the authentication object.
  • Classes in com.erudika.para.security used by com.erudika.para.security.filters
    Class Description
    UserAuthentication
    A simple wrapper for the authentication object.
